alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Santa Monica Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 23 at 9:15PM PST until November 25 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THURSDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THURSDAY TO 11 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains and Santa Monica Mountains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 3 PM PST Thursday. For the Wind Advisory, from 3 PM Thursday to 11 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Santa Monica Mountains
